pages.text: The $(major)Teleport$(0) Gene allows players to $(minor)teleport forward$(0) when the Teleport key (currently bound to $(k:key.geneticsresequenced.teleport)) is used.$(br2)This has a configurable cooldown, with the default being 1 second. The distance is also configurable, defaulting to 10 blocks.$(br2)This Gene $(minor)cannot be given to mobs$(0).
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br2)â€¢ Enderman
